name: 6 Weeks of Psychology Class
description:
6 WEEKS OF PSYCHOLOGY

I have this class, right? 

It's called 'Understanding Personality'. 

It's pretty good, we have to make a folio of our experiences at the mid and end of the semester. Now the lecturer, get this, says we can do what we want so long as we can justify it.

Now you can study 6 Weeks of Psychology for absolutely fuck all, Universities are ripping you off when T-Dog is around.

Fuck yeah.

(also u have to alt-tab because u cant escape because this was an assessment so suffer like i did)

All music by Komiku, you can have a listen or download here: https://chezmonplaisir.bandcamp.com/album/poupis-incredible-adventures
